original_text: Arise, go to Paddan-aram to the house of Bethuel your mother's father, and take as your wife from there one of the daughters of Laban your mother's brother.
korean_text: 일어나 밧단아람으로 가서 네 외조부 브두엘의 집에 이르러 거기서 네 외삼촌 라반의 딸 중에서 아내를 맞이하라

sentences.original_text: to the house of Bethuel your mother's father,
and take as your wife from there
one of the daughters of Laban your mother's brother.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 어머니의 오라버니 라반의 딸 중 하나를.
